Html:
Hi I'm getting the error below on one of our servers. All other servers are fine and normal connection via SSMS to the server is fine.

Error gathering Database information: The following exception occurred while trying to enumerate the collection: "TCP Provider: A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond.
". (SqlServerDatabaseEngineInformation.psm1 line 9619, char 7)

Does anyone know what the problem might be?
Thanks

This looks like a login timeout issue. Are you able to connect to the SQL Server instance using SSMS from the same machine that you're running the scripts on?

--Kendal
